TEXT.TITLE: RAYTHEON <RTN> DIRECTOR RESIGNS
TEXT.BODY: Raytheon Co said D. Brainerd Holmes, who retired as Raytheon president in May 1986, has resigned from the board effective April One. The company said Ferdinand Colloredo-Mansfield, chairman of Cabot, Cabot and Forbes, will succeed Holmes on the board. Reuter
